channel.title: Packaging server
channel.description:
I'm trying to package my server. Basically, you open my server. It has Build.bat (or for some people Compile.bat), Initialize.bat (or Run.bat), Bin, and Src. Bin contains my Class files ect. Src contains Java files. So what should my Compile have in it? This is what I have.
[code]@echo off TITLE Building server... Please wait... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]

item.title: Packaging server
